mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.user_id AS "userId", a.open_id AS "openId", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.like_time AS "likeTime", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_quant_team_like( id, mobile, user_id, open_id, team_id, like_time, create_time, update_time, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{likeTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_quant_team_like SET mobile = #{mobile}, user_id = #{userId}, open_id = #{openId}, team_id = #{teamId}, like_time = #{likeTime}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
